title: Veeram Trailer: Kunal Kapoor as Chandu Chekavar is mind blowing in this visually breathtaking promo
text:
Kunal Kapoor and Hrithik Roshan celebrate New Years at Sonali Bendre's

But little did we know, this was the tip of the iceberg. Because the trailer of this movie is finally out and we are speechless. Kunal Kapoor as Chandu Chekavar the rebellious warrior of the 13th century cuts an impressive figure right from the word go. It‚Äôs hard to believe it‚Äôs the same actor who played the carefree producer Raghuvendra in Dear Zindagi. If Kunal Kapoor impressed us, Jayaraj the director has left us rubbing our eyes in awe. The cinematography is mind blowing and we aren‚Äôt exaggerating. Each frame is a visual treat. The focus on the minute details makes this movie even more enriching. The background score perfectly complements the storyline. It‚Äôs the modern version of macbeth that touches upon elements of greed, anger, guilt, love and war. The film is all set to release in Malayalam on 24th February. The Hindi version will release sometime later in March. After this breathtaking trailer, we won‚Äôt‚Äô be surprised if goes viral in the coming days.
